Title: First cross-party talks on social care reform postponed
Description: The five largest parties in England were due to meet this week - but the BBC has learned the talks have been cancelled.

Title: Google adds free Gemini Code Assist tier with 180,000 monthly code completions

Title: Who is Alice Marie Johnson, Trump's newly appointed 'pardon czar'?
Description: Johnson, now 69, was facing life in prison without the possibility of parole for being a first-time nonviolent drug offender.

Title: Clint Hill, the Secret Service agent who tried to shield the Kennedys, dies at 93
Description: Hill received Secret Service awards and was promoted for his actions that day, but for decades blamed himself for Kennedy's death, saying he would gladly have given his life to save the president.

Title: Reconciliation is the key to unlocking Trump's agenda. Here's how it works
Description: Republicans in Congress are turning to a tool of the budget process to pass major elements of President Trump's agenda without the threat of a filibuster from Senate Democrats.

Title: Archaeologists are finding mysterious ancient objects on Norway's melting glaciers. Take a look.
Description:
Ancient humans trekked across mountain glaciers for hunting or trade.
The objects they left behind were frozen into the ice for centuries.

Title: The AI coding apocalypse

Title: Elon Musk hates OpenAI's for-profit transformation plan. He's not the only one.

Title: Boca businessman who stole $1.45 million from 'friend' asks judge to spare him from prison
Description: David Bruce Cohen, 61, said a lengthy prison sentence would eliminate any chance for him to repay the $1.45 million he stole from Tonia Deutsch.
